name: The adventure of the small (but nonetheless heroic) bot that blows up mechanical spiders
name_original: The adventure of the small (but nonetheless heroic) bot that blows up mechanical spiders
description:
I made (code & 3d assets) this game for the GoGodotJam 2 with the theme "Energy Source".

Controls Action Keyboard + Mouse Gamepad (XBox Controller) Fullscreen F11 Move WASD (sorry AZERTY people) Left Stick
Aim Mouse Right Stick
Fire Mouse left Right trigger
Attract objects Mouse right Right bumper
Previous weapon Q (sorry again)
Next weapon Tab / E Left bumper
Dash Space / Shift Left trigger Resources used
  • Akashi font
  • Cafofomusic Sci-fi sound pack
Tutorial that were useful
  • Polyfjord - Animate a Character in 15 Minutes in Blender
  • AGI, An Ansys Company - Part 7: Baking Ambient Occlusion maps in Blender for glTF
  • Gamefromscratch - Keyboard, Mouse and Joystick Input - Godot 3 Tutorial Series
  • GDQuest - FINITE STATE MACHINE IN GODOT
Tools
  • Godot
  • Blender
  • TexTools (blender plugin for easy baking and uv deployment)
  • Affinity (Designer & Photo)
  • Audacity
